EmailTemplate.description: the template sent by the PersonalSiteContactLookup page
EmailTemplate.name: Volunteers Personal Site Contact Lookup
EmailTemplate.subject: Your volunteer information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Here is the link to your Volunteer information:
ADMIN: You must edit this template to put in the full URL to your PersonalSiteContactInfo page. There is no way to get the Sites URL from a merge field in the email template.
The URL should look something like:
https://volunteers-developer-edition.na3.force.com/Volunteers/GW_Volunteers__PersonalSiteContactInfo?contactId={!Contact.Id}
Thank you.
